welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ridge, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this charming city has to offer. Happy travels!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is a modern and efficient facility, offering a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is primarily used for domestic flights and is home to a variety of airlines and shops.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is primarily used for international flights and offers a range of dining options and duty-free shopping.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport handles all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of New Haven Airport, where all commercial flights operate.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
